snippet: Voters should not be fooled. The assault on women’s reproductive health is a central part of the Republican agenda.
abstract: Editorial asserts that Republican presidential candidates are united in their assault on women's reproductive health, seeking to restrict a woman's right to make her own childbearing decisions and to deny essential health care services to millions of women; warns voters to not be fooled and urges Democrats to expose this Republican agenda in the upcoming election.
lead_paragraph: Voters should not be fooled. The assault on women’s reproductive health is a central part of the Republican agenda.
